item.description:
Connecting with Your Angels Class Series

It is my belief that if everyone tapped into their intuitive sense and made decisions from the heart, the world would be a peaceful and harmonious place…   Everyone would feel empowered to be the most they can be. I want you to feel empowered!

 

A beautiful and gentle way to tap into your intuitive sense is by working with the angels. I want you to learn how to access your divinely given intuition, trust it and use it to guide you through your daily life choices. Whether the decisions you have before you are large or small, your intuition is your closest ally. Your intuition is your mechanism for communication with the angels.

 

Through accessing your angelic intuition, you will begin to feel the brilliant wisdom of the angels. My goal with this process is for you to receive consistent messages coming from the angelic realm that feel so good and so right that you begin to trust making decisions and leading your life from this place of pure love.

 

Everyone is capable of communicating with the angels.  This series outlines five steps for connecting with your angels. With patience, determination and a healthy dose of trust, you can learn to have dialogue with them almost as easily as you can talk to your friends…maybe even more easily!

 

Each Class is $25.00, Pay for whole series for 5 weeks for $100.

 

Join us for a free introductory class on Friday, February 10th to find out who the angels are, what angel communication is and how it can be used to deepen your own sense of self and begin to more deeply trust what you already know.  Details on how to sign up for the series will also be provided.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Angel Communications Series of 5 Weeks
